answers.answer: thats great news! i remember what i huge relief it was every u/s i got. yay!!
Yes!! They had me nervous all weekend because of telling me that but my son is great! So I feel so much better
i can imagine! every little thing about pregnancy is so nerve wracking!

question: I was told last week "size doesn't match dates" had an ultra sound this morning and my lil man is fine!! Everything is normal he weighs almost 3 lbs And it was wonderful to get to see him again!! And I got my glucose test results this morning I do NOT have diabetes!! Yay!! Great day!! Minus this cold I have :-(
title: Ultra sound was fine
